member.name: WCM_DATAPLAN_STATUS
member.summary: The WCM_DATAPLAN_STATUS structure specifies subscription information for a network connection.

member.name: WCM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.DataLimitInMegabytes
member.summary: Specifies the data limit, in megabytes.

member.name: WCM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.InboundBandwidthInKbps
member.summary: Specifies the inbound bandwidth, in kilobits per second.

member.name: WCM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.OutboundBandwidthInKbps
member.summary: Specifies the outbound bandwidth, in kilobits per second.

member.name: WCM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.BillingCycle
member.summary: Contains information about the billing cycle.

member.name: WCM_DATAPLAN_STATUS.MaxTransferSizeInMegabytes
member.summary: Specifies the maximum size of a file that can be transferred, in megabytes.
